text: Infor is an industry specific cloud suite provider.
We need to keep abreast with the
technological changes that are happening,
and also we need to be able

to scale our solutions to
thousands of customers.

We started the collaboration
effort with AWS,
and we started to use Amazon Bedrock.

So in our business
applications like Human Capital
Management System, we

provided inbuilt capabilities
for our recruiters
to create job roles and job descriptions.

We have also delivered an AI
assistant for our customers

to have more natural language
interaction with our systems.

So these capabilities we
have built into the product

and these capabilities have
been built based on the

capabilities that have
been made available
through Amazon Bedrock. We are able
to provide zero down time upgrades
and able to provide 99.9% availability
of our systems to our customers.

But thanks to the AWS services
that back that up, with

that confidence, we can
provide the reliability
of our solutions to our customers.
